thread.title: Tim Pawlenty to Leave Financial-Industry Group

author: Gabriel T. Rubin
title: Tim Pawlenty to Leave Financial-Industry Group
text:
WASHINGTON—Tim Pawlenty, the former Minnesota governor, said Tuesday that he is stepping down as head of a prominent financial-industry group next month, amid signals he is weighing another gubernatorial run.
The Republican has been the chief executive of the Financial Services Roundtable, a group that includes some of the largest U.S. financial firms, since 2012.
“Over... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
